intro: Trichomanes agasthianum, commonly known as the mountain holly fern, is a rare and delicate fern species native to the Western Ghats of India. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, Trichomanes agasthianum is considered a vulnerable species, highlighting the importance of conservation efforts in its native region.
